lead_paragraph: The National Wrestling Hall of Fame revoked all awards bestowed upon J. Dennis Hastert, the former United States speaker of the House, after he admitted in court to sexually abusing students.
snippet: The National Wrestling Hall of Fame revoked all awards bestowed upon J. Dennis Hastert, the former United States speaker of the House, after he admitted in court to sexually abusing students.
abstract: National Wrestling Hall of Fame rescinds all awards given to former House Speaker J Dennis Hastert following his public admission of sexually abusing students he coached in 1960s and 1970s.
